ISAUrlMaster.ui:title: ISA URL (Master)
ISAUrlMaster.description: Location of the ISA manager to be connected to first of all

ISAUrlBackup.ui:title: ISA URL (Backup)
ISAUrlBackup.description: Optional backup ISA manager for the gateway to switch to in the event of failure of the master

zoneId.ui:title: Zone ID
zoneId.description: The ID of the zone to use. If omitted, will be using 'default'

serverId.ui:title: Quantel Server ID
serverId.description: The id of the server to control. An integer

allowCloneClips.ui:title: Allow cloning of clips if on wrong server/pool
allowCloneClips.description: If set: If a clip turns out to be on the wrong server, an attempt to copy the clip will be done

suppressDisconnectTime.ui:title: Time to suppress disconnection warnings for
suppressDisconnectTime.description: If the ISA goes down the gateway will temporarily emit a disconnection warning, this is a false flag when a backup ISA is available. This option will suppress the disconnection warning for a number of ms to give the system time to switch without warnings.
